metadata.title: CVE-2024-42147 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: hisilicon/debugfs - Fix debugfs uninit process issueDuring the zip probe process, the debugfs failure does not stopthe probe. When debugfs initialization fails, jumping to theerror branch will also release regs, in addition to its ownrollback operation.As a result, it may be released repeatedly during the regsuninit process. Therefore, the null check needs to be added tothe regs uninit process.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
